messages.content: What is the temperature trend in the underlying region?
The temperature in the upper right of the image is lower than in the lower left.
What is the temperature trend in the underlying region?
The temperature in the upper right of the image is lower than in the lower left.
Why is the thermal infrared band commonly used for land surface temperature retrieval?
The thermal infrared band is commonly used for land surface temperature retrieval as it can effectively capture the sea-land contrast and provide a high-resolution image.
